divs: Sighting DetailsFalling meteor like object fell 20 degrees above Big Dipper then suddenly curved slightly like tail, rising 6 degrees, then disappeared instantly at 10:47 p.m. Aug. 31 above the north western sky. I was the only observer. I saw this in my back yard watching for the meteor shower. There were two meteors 25 degrees to the left of this strange sighting I observed ten minutes earlier which behaved normally.
trends: There has been one other sighting in LaGrange
There were no other sightings in LaGrange on or around August 31st 2007
Summary: Meteor that fell and then rose.
